tier.item: go arrive-3SG.DS. SEQ rise-SS.SEQ chase.away-3PL.P-3SG.DS.SEQ stuff-3PL.POSS
`When theyi (the foreigners) arrived, theyj (the villagers) got up and chased them
away. Theyi threw away their stuff and fled. Then, theyj stole [their stuff].'
